name: R.I.F.P.S.V.A.
description:
Welcome back to 2015 in the form of alternative history. The world has become confused. At the "Wilhelm Defense Institute" in Germany, an unknown accident created strange phenomena and mutations, and soon new terrorist groups began to form. In response, the United Nations Treaty Organization (UNTO) is beginning to subdue enemies by occupying special forces and cities around the world to prevent this. And as a member of the UNTO, you have to end this.

RIFPSVA is a classic 2D FPS survival mini-game.

You can play different modes and different missions, 

and you have to survive from the enemy.

It is currently in development.

Thank You.

RIFPSVA는 고전 2D FPS 서바이벌 미니게임입니다.

다양한 모드와 다양한 임무를 플레이하실수 있고, 적으로부터 살아남아야합니다.

이 게임은 현재 개발중입니다.

감사합니다.
